text: unhonne allaah kee kadee-kadee qasamen khaee thee ki yadi unake paas koee sachetakarta aae to ve samudaayon mein se pratyek se badhakar seedhe maarg par honge. kintu jab unake paas ek sachetakarta aa gaya to is cheez ne dharatee mein unake ghamand aur buree chaalon ke kaaran unakee nafarat hee mein abhivrddhi kee
